title: NFTflow8545

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: I wonder why you are not yet banned for AI posting now here you creating a shill on a shitcoin, every word that a shill can use to shill a shitcoin is all hereÂ  Quoterevolutionize the game, innovative technology.set to take the crypto world by storm, change-maker I always see these so-called compelling words from shitcoin in the past and until now it's still being used by shills like you but when you check these so-called game changer coins they all have the same nature and these are copycat platforms and a team ready to pump and dump in the market, unfortunately, this is not the first and will not be the last as long as there are investors who still believe ignorant on how these scammers work, we will see more shill coin and shills like you.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3395209QuoteNFTflow8545 uses AI bot for posting. Passing off others' words as your own is shady. So I suppose dealing with this account can be risky.
